channel.description: Recent content in Feature Engineering on Datumorphism

item.title: Data Types and Level of Measurement in Machine Learning
item.description: Types of Data There are several debatable categorization methods of data. The first widely spread theory, or level of measurement, is by S. Stevens. The theory categorizes data into four types, nominal, ordinal, interval, and ratio. Other methods are proposed for other fields of research. For example, N. R. Chrisman proposed a different method for cartography. However, these are not generic enough for data science. They are more general than a specific field of research.
